attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to stop taking refugee children under The Dubs Scheme.
attributes.background: We made a commitment to help innocent children who are innocent victims of war and terror. Now, you have quietly changed this and we the people you represent are appalled. We should be leading by example as citizens of the world.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
